        Parameters:
        oldAnnotationId - the id of the AlexandriaAnnotation to deprecate

      • deleteAnnotation

        void deleteAnnotation(AlexandriaAnnotation annotation)
        If the annotation is TENTATIVE, it will be removed from the database. Otherwise, its status will be set to DELETED
        Parameters:
        annotation - The Annotation to delete
